response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unparalleled quality and uniqueness. Given its significance to us, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving for you, considering its worth to you is estimated at $1,000,000. We believe this is an attractive proposition that would not only benefit your collection but also align with our mutual interests in valuing exceptional items. Should you be interested in this offer, please let us know, and we can proceed with the transaction promptly.", "product_price": 950000}
